field.name: sendgrid_api_key
sendgrid_senders
field.description: keys are emails, e.g. "sender-email@tmz.com". used to lookup the sendgrid sender Ids needed when posting to their API.

field.name: sendgrid_lists
field.description: keys are list slugs, e.g. "newsletter-subscribers". used to lookup the sendgrid list Ids needed when posting to their API.

field.name: sendgrid_suppression_group_id
field.description: also called as unsubscribe list ID, sendgrid specifically calls this list as suppression list
